mapper.select: SELECT tp.productName productname, tp.productId productid, tsi.sizeImg sizeimg, tsi.sizePrice sizeprice from t_product tp LEFT JOIN t_color tc ON tp.productId=tc.productId LEFT JOIN t_color_size tcs ON tc.colorid=tcs.colorId LEFT JOIN t_size tsi ON tcs.sizeId=tsi.sizeId group by tp.productId limit 0,8
SELECT * from t_advertising where statuss=1 and (NOW() BETWEEN startTime and DATE_ADD(startTime,INTERVAL minutes MINUTE)) LIMIT 0,3
